title: 18.) Top 40 Countdown - My Husband's Dad Won't Move Out
description:
Matt's dad moved in “temporarily” six months ago, and Matt's wife, Stephanie, is ready for good 'ol dad to leave. - Dr. Laura: "Don't measure the worthiness of a situation by its difficulty."
